articles.content:
Ada Wong
RE4
Another day, another toxic example of fandom directing hate somewhere they shouldnt. Shockingly, its at a women, chasing her off the internet entirely, it seems.

articles.content:
1. How long would it take to fall through an airless, frictionless hole all the way through the Earth?
Answer: 42 minutes
